thread.title: Toni
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Toni

author: Toni
title: Toni
text: I came in to the Denton location last week looking for a tv console & was able to find one that was part of the clearance items. It was perfect! Patrick, my salesperson was very helpful & the best part was that i was able to take it home the same day. I came back 2 days later & purchased a queen mattress set from him. Thanks again!
